text: Click here for SRF Post Details IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for JRF/ SRF Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has announced a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow, Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project “Reconfigurable distribution network(RFD)” in the department of Electrical Engineering on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 14-01-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 03 Name of the Posts: 1. Junior Research Fellow 2. Senior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Masters in Power Systems/ Energy Systems/ Power Electronics, Bachelors in Electrical Engineering/ B.Tech in Electrical Engineering with GATE/ NET qualification with relevant experience. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 14-01-2017. Instructions to Apply online: 1. Before applying Online Applicants should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Online Applicants should log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs” & Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 14-01-2017. For more details like tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emoluments & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online – IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for JRF, JRF/ SRF Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has given a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow, Junior Research Fellow/Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the two different projects on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 07-01-2017 for Post 01, 10-01-2017 for Post 02. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Junior Research Fellow/ Senior Research Fellow: 01Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 28 years for Post 01, 26 years for Post 02. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc. in Botany/ Biochemistry/ Biotechnology with valid GATE/ NET score for Post 01, M.Tech/ B.Tech in Aerospace or Mechanical Engineering with valid GATE score for Post 02 with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 07-01-2017 for Post 01, 10-01-2017 for Post 02. Instructions to Apply online: 1. Before applying Online candidates should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs” & Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Important Dates: Last Date to Apply Online for Post 1: 07-01-2017. Last Date to Apply Online for Post 2: 10-01-2017. For more details like tenure, remuneration, experience other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online for Post 2 – IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Project Manager Posts: Department of Chemical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Project Manager vacancies for the project entitled of “Optimal design and scale-up photobioreactor for high density algal cell production(ICB4)” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply Online on or before 18-01-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Project Manager Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be below 35 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have PhD Degree in Chemical Engineering/ Biochemical Engineering/ Biotechnology & have good English communication skills, both written and oral. Application Fee: Applicants required to pay Rs.50/- in the form of Demand Draft drawn in favour of IIT Kharagpur payable at Kharagpur. Female candidates are exempted from this payment. How to Apply : Eligible candidates can apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 18-01-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online Applicants should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature. 2. Online Applicants should log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to ”Temporary Jobs” & Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 18-01-2017. For more details like duration of category, tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emolument, selection process, age relaxation, Salary and benefits, compensation & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online - IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for JRF Posts: Department of Aerospace Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has invited applications for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow vacancies for the project entitled “LES of shock-turbulence interaction in supersonic pipe & diffuser flows(STI)” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 24-01-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Junior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess ME/ M.Tech in Aerospace/ Mechanical Engg with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 24-01-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online candidates should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs”& Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on ”Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 24-01-2017. For more details like tenure, remuneration, experience other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online – IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online Jr/ Sr Research Fellow Posts: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has issued a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow/ Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project “Microstructure Engineering to Enhance Resistance Against Creep & High Temperature Hot Corrosion in a Ni-Based Superalloy (MEE)” in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply online on or before 24-01-2017. Other details like educational qualification & how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Junior Research Fellow/ Senior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Under graduation Degree (B.E., B. Tech or equivalent) in Metallurgical and Materials Engg./ Mechanical Engineering, (Minimum CGPA 7.0 or Minimum percentage of marks 65%) with Postgraduate Degree (M.E., M. Tech or equivalent) in Metallurgical and Materials Engg.,/ Mechanical Engineering(Minimum CGPA 7.5 or Minimum percentage of marks 70%) Or ii) Under graduation Degree (B.E., B. Tech or equivalent) in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering with Minimum CGPA 8.0 (or Minimum percentage of marks 75%) with valid GATE/ NET score for JRF and JRF qualification with two years research experience for SRF. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 24-01-2017. Instructions to Apply online: 1. Before applying Online Applicants should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Online Applicants should log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs” & Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Last Date for Submission of Application: 24-01-2017. For more details like sponsor, qualification, compensation & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online - IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for JRF/ SRF Posts: School of Medical Science and Technology, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has invited applications for the recruitment of Junior/ Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project entitled “Development of suitable microalgae harvesting technology” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 26-01-2017. Other details like age, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Junior/ Senior Research Fellow Age Limit: Candidates age should be 30 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Tech. or B.Tech. in Chemical Engineering/ Biochemical Engineering/ Environmental Engineering/ Applied Botany/ Biotechnology or Master Degree in Microbiology/ Biochemistry/ Material science with valid NET/ GATE score for JRF, relevant experience for SRF. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 26-01-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online candidates should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs”& Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6. Take print out of Online application form for future use. Last Date to Apply Online: 26-01-2017. For more details like tenure, remuneration, experience other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Apply Online IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for SRF Posts: School of Medical Science and Technology, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has invited applications for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project entitled “Establishing a Resource Bank of Exhaled Breath Metabolites in Respiratory Diseases & Exploring the Feasibilty of these Molecules as Potential Diagnostic Markers” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 26-01-2017. Other details like age, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Senior Research Fellow Age Limit: Candidates age should be 30 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc (Life Sciences or Allied subjects), M.Tech (Biotechnology/ Biomedical Engineering/ Chemical Engineering) / M. Pharm with relevant experience. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www..iitkgp.ac.in on or before 26-01-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying Online candidates should have valid personal email ID, scanned copies of passport size photo & signature 2. Log on to website www.iitkgp.ac.in. 3. Go to “Temporary Jobs”& Select the Desired Post. 4. Read notification carefully & Click on “Apply Online”. 5. Fill all the details carefully & Submit the form. 6.
